headline: Carney Looks to AI for Savings as Canada’s Budget Pressures Mount
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Prime Minister Mark Carney said Canada will begin to use artificial intelligence “at scale” to make the government more productive, as his administration looks for ways to squeeze out cost savings in a time of economic pressure. headline: Treasuries Vie for Demand With Japan’s Bonds, Deutsche Says
summary: (Bloomberg) -- US Treasuries are facing increased competition from Japanese bonds, where rising yields are making the notes more attractive for local buyers, according to Deutsche Bank AG.
